content: In Encounter resource regarding Hospitalization we need to store admitted date and discharge date by using period (which indicates the start and end of encounter). We are trying to save anticipated discharge date (expected discharge date) in Hospitalization Encounter before discharge. Where we can we sort this information in Encounter resources? Can anyone suggest me.
There's been a recent thread on this topic https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179166-implementers/topic/Encounter.20expected.2Fplanned.20discharge
